testcase.classname: Orangelogin HRM with set of users
testcase.name: Test Orange HRM Login
testcase.system-out: Given A browser is available........................................................passed And Login fields are displayed.......................................................passed When valid user id & password is entered..................................................passed Then User is able to Login.........................................................passed When User Management section is clicked...................................................passed Then System users must be displayed.....................................................passed When add button is clicked.........................................................passed Then new user field must be displayed....................................................passed When user details are added and saved....................................................passed Then System displays the user save confirmation message..........................................passed When User is select & deleted from the system................................................passed Then user should not be displayed under User management screen.......................................passed Then Logout of the application.......................................................passed But Login page should not be displayed...................................................passed
